clfSvm

PURPOSE

Wrapper for svm that makes svm compatible with nfoldxval.

SYNOPSIS

function net = clfSvm(varargin)

DESCRIPTION 

 Wrapper for svm that makes svm compatible with nfoldxval.

 Requires the SVM toolbox by Anton Schwaighofer.

 USAGE
  net = clfSvm(varargin)

 INPUTS
  see svm in SVM toolbox by Anton Schwaighofer.

 OUTPUTS
  see svm in SVM toolbox by Anton Schwaighofer.

 EXAMPLE

 See also SVM, NFOLDXVAL
